BOSTON, MA - @RiparianData - Full Time

Riparian Data is a small, Boston based startup devoted to building a better mobile email app for today's overloaded office workers.

We're running a Meteor stack on top of Node.js, with straight Ruby for services on the back end. This is all supported by a Mongo database.

Hiring: Product Owner and Software Engineer More details: http://www.ripariandata.com/jobs/ email us: hr@ripariandata.com
